name: bustly-search-data
description: Bustly multi-platform e-commerce data query skill for OpenClaw - Shopify, Google Ads, BigCommerce, WooCommerce, Magento

scripts.shop:info: tsx -e 'import { getShopInfo } from "./lib/presets-v2"; getShopInfo().then(r => console.log(JSON.stringify(r, null, 2)))'
scripts.orders:recent: tsx -e 'import { getRecentOrders } from "./lib/presets-v2"; getRecentOrders(10).then(r => console.log(JSON.stringify(r, null, 2)))'
scripts.orders:summary: tsx -e 'import { getDailySalesSummary } from "./lib/presets-v2"; getDailySalesSummary(30).then(r => console.log(JSON.stringify(r, null, 2)))'
scripts.products:top: tsx -e 'import { getTopProductsByRevenue } from "./lib/presets-v2"; getTopProductsByRevenue(10, 30).then(r => console.log(JSON.stringify(r, null, 2)))'
scripts.customers:top: tsx -e 'import { getTopCustomers } from "./lib/presets-v2"; getTopCustomers(10).then(r => console.log(JSON.stringify(r, null, 2)))'
scripts.ads:campaigns: tsx -e 'import { getGoogleAdsCampaigns } from "./lib/presets-v2"; getGoogleAdsCampaigns(10).then(r => console.log(JSON.stringify(r, null, 2)))'
scripts.catalog: tsx -e 'import { getDataCatalog } from "./lib/presets-v2"; getDataCatalog().then(r => console.log(JSON.stringify(r, null, 2)))'
scripts.platforms:summary: tsx -e 'import { getConnectedPlatformsSummary } from "./lib/presets-v2"; getConnectedPlatformsSummary().then(r => console.log(JSON.stringify(r, null, 2)))'
